name: Firefox - Ambiance Coherent Style
description:
It's a style for Firefox :)

This is the main style.
For the error page, you must install this style : http://userstyles.org/styles/59972/firefox-error-page-shorlander-inspired?r=1327656547

Blog Post : http://gniii.org/blog/2012/01/27/ambiance-coherent-userstyle/
Demonstration (only visible in Firefox!!!) : http://gniii.org/blog/wp-content/code/firefoxstyle/coherent.html
